content: **a quick fun little project a great stash buster ** they take me about an hour or so to make i m planning on doing them in rainbow colors i haven t tried a multi colored yarn yet that would be fun please do post your projects i love to see them the pattern is very detailed with lots of pictures supplies yarn in two colors color a pictured dark green and aspen color b white or light green or… the samples pictured were made with hobbii rainbow cotton 8/4 which is a #1 superfine and another with stylecraft special dk you can make it in any weight yarn just switch the hook to a size appropriate to the yarn your ornament will just be a bit bigger or smaller you only use a small amount of yarn about 45 yards of the main color maybe 20 of the highlight color hook i used a 2 5 mm c crochet hook for the thin cotton yarn and a 3 0 mm d for the dk version tapestry needle one bead stitch marker gauge not important my finished ornaments in the 8/4 cotton yarn are about 3 25 tall excluding the bead and hanging loop in the dk yarn about 3 5 tall stitches us terms chain chain sl slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet triple crochet blo back loop only these are stitches worked into the back loop of the v of the stitch instead of both loops in this pattern you will be doing blo treble_crochet back loop only triple crochet
